snippet: Ford Motor Co said on Thursday it is recalling nearly 200,000 Taurus sedans in North America from the 2010 to 2014 model years on a corrosion issue....

headline.print_headline: Ford Recalls Nearly 200,000 Taurus Sedans in North America
headline.main: Ford Recalls Nearly 200,000 Taurus Sedans in North America

lead_paragraph: Ford Motor Co said on Thursday it is recalling nearly 200,000 Taurus sedans in North America from the 2010 to 2014 model years on a corrosion issue.
